New In-Store Services Available From Behr Paint & Home Depot
Dear {!if(Lead.FirstName="", Contact.FirstName,Lead.FirstName)},
In our continued effort to offer outstanding service to our customers, Behr is excited to announce the addition of a new support position from your Behr Team & The Home Depot.
Leo Vargas now holds the position of Pro Paint Sales & Service Specialist at The Long Island City Home Depot, Store 1255. Leo is a full time Behr Employee working within the store to support our Professional Behr Customers with their product & service needs. Think of it as your Behr Paint Store within The Home Depot.
In his role, Leo will be able to:
- Take your orders by phone on his direct line.
- Process your orders and have them available for pick up or delivery.
- Schedule deliveries.
- Color matching.
- Capture & record your color information by job.
In addition, The Long Island City Home Depot offers:
- Increased inventory levels to support your projects.
- Expanded product offering including products such as DTM, Block Filler & Dryfall.
Leo will be available to service your needs Monday thru Friday from 7:00am through 4:00pm. His contact info is:
Cell: (347) 930-8575
Email: LVargas@BehrPaint.com
Home Depot Long Island City #1255
50-10 Northern Blvd
Long Island City, NY 11101
Please don't hesitate to give Leo a call for your Behr Paint needs. We look forward to serving you!
Sincerely,
{!if(Contact.OwnerFullName="",Lead.OwnerFullName,Contact.OwnerFullName)} {!if(Contact.OwnerTitle="", Lead.OwnerTitle,Contact.OwnerTitle)} {!if(Contact.OwnerPhone="", Lead.OwnerPhone,Contact.OwnerPhone)} {!if(Contact.OwnerEmail="", Lead.OwnerEmail,Contact.OwnerEmail)}
